job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtModis is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer in San Jose CA This will be working in a fastpaced global enterprise environment and will require the Machine Learning Engineer to be onsite The ideal Machine Learning Engineer must have strong leadership and communication skills in addition to technical expertiseampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtPOSITION SUMMARYampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtThe role is to support the engineering development of ADASAD feature for series production The focus is development US specific feature and validation of the same The responsibility starts with creating machine learning models for sensor fusion situation interpretation and path plannerltligtltligtOnce SW is integrated this position will be responsible to perform integration testing in HILSIL lab and after successful testing the same need to be verified and validated in target vehicle environmentltligtltulgtltpgtRole ResponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtDeveloping machine learning models for Situation and Interpretation modules Ex Intention prediction Corridor buildup etc 60ltligtltligtData collection and training neural networks with large amounts of data 20ltligtltligtSoftware Integration and Verification in HILSIL 20ltligtltulgtltpgtRequiredltpgtltulgtltligt3 years of experience with AI  deep learning concepts and experience with at least few of the topics like trajectory prediction behavior prediction multimodal architectures recurrent architectures like LSTMs transformers attention uncertainty probabilistic models graphical neural nets model compressionoptimization etcltligtltligtBachelors Degree in Engineering computer science or comparableltligtltligtA good fundamental understanding of AI  deep learning conceptsltligtltligtExperience with at least few of the topics like trajectory prediction behavior prediction multimodal architectures recurrent architectures like LSTMs transformers attention uncertainty probabilistic models graphical neural nets model compressionoptimization etcltligtltligtExperience with some of the open source datasets like Argoverse kitti nuscenes etc andor similar data coming from simulation  eg CARLA etcltligtltligtStrong coding backgroundltligtltulgt
